question: CPU scheduling is the basis of ___________
What are the two steps of a process execution?
An I/O bound program will typically have ____________
incorrect answers: a few very short CPU bursts
a few very short I/O bursts

question: A process is selected from the ______ queue by the ________ scheduler, to be executed
In the following cases non – preemptive scheduling occurs?
incorrect answers: When a process switches from the running state to the ready state
When a process switches from the waiting state to the ready state
correct_answer: When a process goes from the running state to the waiting state

question: The switching of the CPU from one process or thread to another is called ____________
What is Dispatch latency?
incorrect answers: the speed of dispatching a process from running to the ready state
the time of dispatching a process from running to ready state and keeping the CPU idle
correct_answer: the time to stop one process and start running another one

question: Scheduling is done so as to ____________
Scheduling is done so as to ____________
incorrect answers: increase the duration of a specific amount of work

question: What is Turnaround time?
incorrect answers: the total waiting time for a process to finish execution
the total time spent in the ready queue
the total time spent in the running queue
correct_answer: the total time from the completion till the submission of a process

question: Scheduling is done so as to ____________
incorrect answers: there is no relation between scheduling and turnaround time

question: What is Waiting time?
incorrect answers: the total time in the blocked and waiting queues
the total time spent in the running queue
the total time from the completion till the submission of a process
correct_answer: the total time spent in the ready queue

question: Scheduling is done so as to ____________
incorrect answers: keep the waiting time the same

question: What is Response time?
incorrect answers: the total time taken from the submission time till the completion time
the total time taken from submission time till the response is output
correct_answer: the total time taken from the submission time till the first response is produced
